overview:
Jackie Lai is a social media and online business enthusiast. He has helped small conventional businesses reap the benefits of the online world. He loves exploring big successful business like the Group buying model and replicate it on a smaller level to promote entrepreneurship. His project http://www.GroupDom.us aims to do exactly that - THIS is being worked upon right now and will be done by the 10th October and will be made open to Entrepreneur Wannabees.

He also provides free consulting to anyone who needs it, with regards to Social media management, strategy, monetization, Google Adwords, Search Engine marketing, Google aps integration, Social Media Management tools integration, and everything that has to do with Online media.

You can reach him through the twitter handle @groupdomUS
